org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core

Interface SelectOneOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.Row,SelectOneOperation>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectOneOperation

    public interface SelectOneOperation
extends QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.Row,SelectOneOperation>
    SelectOneOperation is used for single result.
    Author:
    Alex Shvid
